'''4th Ascension Passives''' are passive [[Talents]] unlocked at [[Character#Ascensions|Ascension]] Phase 4 of each [[Character]]. Ascension Phase 4 is available at character level 60.

Often, these passives provide an improvement to a Combat Talent of the character.
